FuncDef: This command specifies whether time-exceeded ICMP messages should be sent. When enabled, ICMPv6 time-exceeded messages are generated by this interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of time-exceeded ICMP messages are to be issued in the time frame specified by the seconds parameter. Values-10 to 2000.
Specifies the time frame, in seconds, that is used to limit the number of time-exceeded ICMP message to be issued. Values-1 to 60.
